document_data.name: Ragash
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ragash of the Red Mist''' was a [[half-orc]] [[hunter]] operating out of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I suspect not all [[Volothamp Geddarm|he]] says can be trusted.|Ragash of the Red Mist}}
document_data.Activities: She specialized in hunting intelligent prey, namely [[Batiri]] [[goblin]]s, [[yuan-ti]], [[lizardfolk]], and some [[ape]]s. She was also willing to help other hunters by providing them with lures to bait such creatures.
document_data.Relationships: Ragash was a member of the [[Hunters' Guild of Chult]], and could often be found at [[Hunter's Square]] in Port Nyanzaru.
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]]{{ToA-time}} Ragash became acquainted with [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. During this time, she was interested in hunting a number of notable individuals within the Chultan jungle, namely the Batiri [[beast master]] known as [[Clawgraze]], a lizardfolk [[druid]] known as [[Redfang (lizardfolk)|Redfang]], and two [[yuan-ti abomination]]s known as the "[[Fang of Dendar]]" and [[Kutlass]].
